column4: Cactus that blooms around easter time. Pink flowers.
Short clusters. Rarely will bloom yellow flowers.
Resembles a fairy castle with many small arms. White flowers bloom at night.
This is actually a succulent called a cactus. Shaped like an aloe plant with thick white stripes.
Five pound bag of cactus potting soil. Well draining.
Random assortment of 3 cactus' in a 4 in. terra cotta pot.
Random assortment of 3 cactus' in a 6 in. terra cotta pot.
Tall cactus with long white hairs that look like an old man.
